<answer>The search results show two emails related to the Phoenix Project:

1. Email 1:
   - Sender: emma.johnson@bluesparrowtech.com
   - Recipients: david.smith@bluesparrowtech.com
   - Subject: Project Update

2. Email 2:

These emails indicate that Emma Johnson initially requested an update on the Phoenix Project from David Smith, and he subsequently provided a report.</answer>
